content.prompt: Which of the following statements best explains sense of place as demonstrated by the image?

choices.label: The use of shared religion creates an attachment to this landscape.
The use of ethnic languages creates an attachment to this landscape.
The presence of community supported agriculture (CSA) and local markets creates an attachment to this landscape.
Suburban sprawl and its use of space contribute to sense of place in this landscape.
Redlining of multi-ethnic neighborhoods contributes to sense of place.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain patterns and trends in visual sources to draw conclusions.
